data.title: Sumeet Raghavan: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Sumeet Raghavan: Check out the list of all Sumeet Raghavan movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Sumeet Raghavan news on Times of India.
data.text:
Let's leave Sarabhai.. alone, and not recreate it: Sumeet Raghavan

TNN / Feb 09, 2024, 08:00 (IST)

Sumeet Raghavan, who is best known as Sahil from the cult sitcom Sarabhai V/S Sarabhai, feels the show has had its day. “During our reunion in 2015, we shared a few pictures which got a fabulous response from our fans, which is why we brought season 2 and it was fun. But Season 2 was compared to the first season,” he said, adding, “Once a masterpiece is created, it’s best to not attempt any sequel/redux. Cult shows have their magic and fan following, they should remain untouched.” Excerpts from our chat with him on his recent visit to the city:

From actress to writer: Pariva Pranati pens down a few episodes for Wagle Ki Duniya

etimes.in / Feb 16, 2024, 16:27 (IST)

Wagle Ki Duniya is a relatable storytelling show that captures the essence of everyday life for the common man. It has aired 600 different stories spanning 900 episodes on Indian television. The show maintains freshness and innovation by embracing creativity from the cast and crew.

From advocating women’s safety to tackling child labour: Wagle Ki Duniya has been addressing daily social issues for three years

etimes.in / Feb 05, 2024, 15:55 (IST)

Celebrating three wonderful years of heartwarming storytelling, ‘Wagle Ki Duniya: Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey’ has truly made its mark on Indian television. Beyond providing entertainment, the show has been addressing daily social issues and encouraging open conversations. With its positive impact, relatable storytelling, Wagle Ki Duniya continues to be a powerful medium for positive change.

Sumeet Raghavan and Pariva Pranati on Wagle Ki Duniya completing 3 years

etimes.in / Jan 29, 2024, 13:56 (IST)

Against the dynamic setting of Mumbai, Wagle Ki Duniya skillfully portrays the challenges, pleasures, and victories of the everyday person. As the series marks its impressive three-year milestone, it remains a shining example of compelling storytelling. The exceptional cast is led by the talents of Sumeet Raghavan, Pariva Pranati, Bharti Achrekar, and Anjan Srivastava.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Sumeet Raghavan's singing journey as Rajesh mirrors his real-life passion for music

etimes.in / Jan 17, 2024, 20:34 (IST)

'Wagle Ki Duniya' showcases Rajesh's heartfelt pursuit of his lifelong dream of music, beautifully merging with Sumeet Raghavan's own passion for singing. The actor seamlessly integrates his love for music into his character, creating an authentic connection. Tune in to witness Rajesh's inspiring musical journey. When the cameras aren't rolling, the actor is often seen singing, playing the harmonium, and creating a musical mehfil.

Sumeet Raghavan, Mahesh Thakur, Nishant Malkani & Pariva Pranati share their New Year aspirations

IANS / Dec 31, 2023, 21:30 (IST)

Actors Sumeet Raghavan, Nishant Malkani, Mahesh Thakur, and Pariva Pranati share their year-end reflections and aspirations for the New Year. Sumeet values family and encourages everyone to cherish moments with loved ones. Nishant expresses gratitude for being part of the project 'Pashminna' and wishes his fans love and beautiful moments in the coming year. Mahesh sees the New Year as a fresh start, focusing on the success of the show 'Aangan Aapno Kaa' and hopes for joy and love for the viewers. Pariva emphasizes the importance of time and creating precious memories with family and friends.

Sumeet Raghavan's musical ode to Amitabh Bachchan

IANS / Nov 05, 2023, 16:21 (IST)

Actor Sumeet Raghavan paid a musical tribute to Amitabh Bachchan on the quiz show Big B. Bachchan was impressed by Raghavan's singing skills and asked him to perform for the studio audience and viewers at home. Raghavan sang a medley of Bachchan's songs, including "Chookar Mere Mann Ko" from the film Yaarana, "Salaam-E-Ishq Meri Jaan Zara Qubool Kar Lo" from Muqaddar Ka Sikandar, and "Pyar Hamen Kis Mod Pe" from Satte Pe Satta. Bachchan praised Raghavan's performance and expressed his respect for musicians.

Wagle Ki Duniya: Atharva gets accused of being involved in a paper-leaking scandal

etimes.in / Dec 18, 2023, 18:43 (IST)

In recent episodes of 'Wagle Ki Duniya - Nayi Peedhi Naye Kissey', the Wagles adapt to Rajesh's absence and Vandana imparts a valuable lesson to Atharva. Atharva finds himself at the center of a scandal at school when a leaked exam paper is discovered in his and Vidyut's bags. The accusation leaves Atharva accused of being involved in a paper-leaking scandal. The upcoming episodes will reveal whether Atharva and Vidyut succumbed to the pressure of studies or if they are being falsely implicated.
